project_components

Class Component

  • java.lang.Object
    • project_components.Component
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FittedComponent

    public abstract class Component
extends java.lang.Object
    Primitive entity of the project. It has no features drawing-related and is only described with the essential attributes.
    Author:
    Enrico Ferro
